title: The Sorrow Tree
lyrics:
Down, my love
And held nowhere
He will come and meet me there
Oh. he'll wait for me
Beneath the sorrow tree

Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree

Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree



Tell my love I'm waiting there

Oh, and he'll know where

My love will mourn for me

Beneath the sorrow tree



Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree

Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree



Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree

Ooooh

Beneath the sorrow tree



Ooooh
